sections.title: Argo CD Consulting & Implementation
sections.description: Argo CD is a GitOps-based continuous delivery tool for Kubernetes. Our experts help define application manifests, track deployment states, and configure your environment for reliability and scalability.
offerings: Assess your current environment and architect the Argo CD deployment solution.
Deploy and configure Argo CD for applications and infrastructure.
Implement GitOps patterns using Git as the single source of truth for your apps.
Manage deployment of application states across multiple environments.
Configure single sign-on with OIDC, OAuth2, LDAP, or SAML 2.0.
Support high-availability Argo CD setups for enterprise-grade reliability.

sections.title: Achieve GitOps with Argo CD
sections.description: Implement GitOps practices to manage infrastructure and applications using Git as the authoritative source, enabling auditability and faster deployments.
offerings: Separate source code and Kubernetes manifests to enable safe changes.
Automate synchronization of application state with declarative configuration.
Visualize deployment issues and remediate configuration drifts.
Ensure new configurations are correctly deployed to Kubernetes clusters.

sections.title: Set Up Multi-Tenancy with Argo CD
sections.description: Enable multiple teams to work independently within the same Kubernetes cluster while maintaining security and access controls.
offerings: Implement multi-tenancy setups to isolate projects and teams.
Restrict CRDs to read only project-specific repositories and deploy to designated clusters and namespaces.
Define role-based access controls (RBAC) for each CRD instance.

sections.title: Argo CD Training & Managed Support
sections.description: Upskill your team and provide ongoing support to maximize your Argo CD investment.
offerings: Deploy Argo CD or get on-demand enterprise support from certified engineers.
Post-implementation training to build in-house Argo CD expertise.
